name: 朱建嘉
objective:
(1) 教授最新過濾膜的開發技術以及在水資源與廢水處理的應用。
(2) 實際操作過濾膜的製作流程以及測量方式，並與商業化產品做比較。
(3) 請業界廠商實際講述目前業界的應用範圍以及整體系統規劃概念。
materials:
1. "Basic Principles of Membrane Technology" 2nd edition
2. SST REPORT NO. 1098-1 “Polyamide Reverse Osmosis Membrane Fouling and Its Prevention: Oxidation- Resistant Membrane Development, Membrane Surface Smoothing and Enhanced Membrane Hydrophilicity.”
3. A Thesis of Stony Brook University “Interfacial Polymerization on Cellulose Nanofiber-Based Membrane as a New Pathway for Fabrication of Thin Film Nanocomposite Membrane.”
